title: Direct threat targeting Jane Doe posted on X/Twitter
content: Jane Doe thinks she's safe at Acme HQ. She's wrong. We know her schedule and she will pay for what Acme did. Tomorrow at the town hall.

title: Hostile surveillance post referencing Acme HQ entrance
content: Interesting how the security at Acme HQ main entrance is just two guards and a badge reader. Side entrance on Market St has no camera coverage after 6pm. Easy access.

title: Fixated individual escalating grievance language against Acme CEO
content: Third post this week. Acme destroyed my life. CEO Jane Doe personally approved my termination. These corporate elites need to be held accountable. Someone needs to do something about her. I know where she lives.

title: Protest planned near Acme NYC Office next Tuesday
content: RALLY ALERT: Join us Tuesday 3pm at Acme NYC Office. Blockade the entrance. Bring signs. They can't ignore us. Share widely!

title: Fan account mentions CEO at public charity event
content: Great seeing Jane Doe at the SF Food Bank charity gala last night! She gave an amazing speech about corporate responsibility. #AcmeCares #Leadership

title: Same threat actor — follow-up post with escalating language
content: I posted about Jane Doe yesterday and nobody listened. This is your last warning. The town hall event at Acme HQ on March 15 will be remembered. I have nothing left to lose.

title: Travel advisory content — unrest near San Francisco destination
content: PSA: Major protests expected in downtown SF this week. Multiple roads blocked near Financial District. If you're traveling to SF for business, reroute from Market St area. Stay safe!

title: Insider threat — former employee sharing access details
content: Former Acme employee here. The badge system at HQ uses HID ProxPoint readers, series 6005. Default admin PIN is still the one from 2024 installation. Security office shift change is at 11pm. Night crew is just one guard.
